alert.note: Alert for Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Tusas Mountains Including Chama (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 11 at 12:43PM MDT until October 11 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 7 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. For the second Wind Advisory, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, and Tusas Mountains Including Chama. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, until 6 PM MDT this evening. For the second Wind Advisory, from 9 AM to 7 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Tusas Mountains Including Chama
